Description.Text: Element Calgary Airport is a convenient shuttle ride away from Calgary International Airport (YYC). Head downtown to experience thriving businesses, Calgary Tower views, the Glenbow Museum, the Flames' Scotiabank Saddledome, and the Calgary Stampede. Nearby are the University of Calgary and the Calgary Zoo. And the beautiful Canadian Rockies are only an hour away.
Modern design incorporating different shapes and colours.

Restore: Gourmet Pantry. We help keep you on track with a wholesome, complimentary breakfast each morning, plus our 24-hour grab-and-go pantry for nourishing and delicious options around the clock. Grab a snack on the run or ingredients for an easy meal in,your in-room fully-equipped kitchen provides a wholesome alternative to dining out.
